Class IO

  • java.lang.Object
    • IO

  • public final class IO
extends java.lang.Object
    Library class IO contains a set of methods for easy input and output through dialogs, a method freezing program for a specified number of miliseconds and a method converting text to ASCII by removing accents
    Version:
    1.01.4240 — 2012-10-13
    Author:
    Rudolf PECINOVSKÝ

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  IO.Correction
      Class Correction is library class providing methods for correcting various inconsistencies of working with graphical input and output
      static class  IO.Informant
      Instances of the class Informant are mediators between testing and tested objects.
      static interface  IO.ITester
      Instances of the interface ITester are testing objects which want to be informed about interesting events.
      static class  IO.WinAdapter
      Instances of class WindoewAdapter represents ...

    • Method Detail

      • confirm

        public static boolean confirm(java.lang.Object question)
        Opens a dialog titled "Question" with a given message (asked question) and asks user to answer YES or NO. If it doesn't answer and closes the dialog, the whole application exits.
        Parameters:
        question - The asked question
        Returns:
        true if the user has answered YES, false if the user answered NO

      • endIf

        public static void endIf(boolean end)
        If the condition in parameter is met then opens a dialog with message END When this dialog is closed, aplication exits
        Parameters:
        end - Condition, when met aplication exits

      • endIf

        public static void endIf(boolean end,
                         java.lang.String message)
        If the condition is met then opens a dialog with specified message When this dialog is closed, aplication exits
        Parameters:
        end - Condition, when met aplication exits
        message - Message displayed in the dialog. If equals null or empty string, displays END.

      • enter

        public static double enter(java.lang.Object prompt,
                           double defaultDouble)
        Opens a dialog asking user for entering a double value; after closing the window by the closing button the application exits.
        Parameters:
        prompt - The displayed text message
        defaultDouble - The default value
        Returns:
        Value entered by user or confirmed implicit value

      • enter

        public static int enter(java.lang.Object prompt,
                        int defaultInt)
        Opens a dialog asking user for entering requested integer value; after closing the window by the closing or Cancel button, the application exits.
        Parameters:
        prompt - The displayed text message
        defaultInt - The default value
        Returns:
        Value entered by user or confirmed implicit value

      • enter

        public static java.lang.String enter(java.lang.Object prompt,
                                     java.lang.String defaultString)
        Opens a dialog asking user for entering requested String value; when it closes the window with the closing or Cancel button, application exits.
        Parameters:
        prompt - The displayed text message
        defaultString - The default value
        Returns:
        Value entered by user or confirmed implicit value

      • inform

        public static void inform(java.lang.Object text)
        Opens a dialog with specified message and wait for confirmation by pressing OK; when the dialog is closed by closing button the aplication exits.
        Parameters:
        text - The shown message

      • pause

        public static void pause(int milliseconds)
        Freezes the program execution for specified nuber of miliseconds. It doesn't react on interrupt - it only ends earlier. However before end it sets the interrupt flag to allot the calling method to recognize that the thread was interrupted.
        Parameters:
        milliseconds - The length of freezing time in milliseconds

      • removeAccents

        public static java.lang.String removeAccents(java.lang.String text)
        Removes all accents from the given text; simultaneously it also removes all characters which are not in ASCII.
        Parameters:
        text - Text converted to ASCII
        Returns:
        Result text

      • setDialogsPosition

        public static void setDialogsPosition(int x,
                                      int y)
        Set the future dialog positon.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of desired location
        y - x-coordinate of desired location
